scripts.clean: rimraf -f build && rimraf -f browser && mkdir build && cd build && mkdir ts && mkdir rollup && mkdir terser && cd .. && mkdir browser
scripts.terser: terser -c passes=2 -m --sequences 40 build/rollup/peg.umd.js > build/terser/peggy.umd.min.js && terser -c passes=2 -m --sequences 40 --module build/rollup/peg.esmodule.js > build/terser/peggy.esmodule.min.js
scripts.deploy: rm -f browser/peggy.min.js && cp build/terser/peggy.umd.min.js browser/peggy.min.js && cp build/terser/peggy.umd.min.js docs/vendor/peggy/peggy.min.js
scripts.audit: npm run test && npm run benchmark
scripts.make: npm run ts && npm run rollup && npm run terser && npm run parser
scripts.setup: npm run clean && npm run set_version
scripts.build-notidy: node ./tools/announce "Static source analysis" && npm run analyze && node ./tools/announce "Setting up the build" && npm run setup && node ./tools/announce "Making libraries" && npm run make && node ./tools/announce "Running Audits" && npm run audit && node ./tools/announce "Creating distributions" && npm run deploy && node ./tools/announce "Complete!"
scripts.tidy: mv build/terser/* build/ && rimraf -f build/rollup && rimraf -f build/terser && rimraf -f build/ts
scripts.build: npm run build-notidy && npm run tidy
